What's this worth? It's pretty neat. People don't see you change the location setting, so you won't spam the room. Does the item preserve location settings when the gold ring is taken?

a rune-carved shadowy wraithaline brooch (multi-setting gold ring holder)

The brooch bears a small circular slot which looks like it would fit a gold ring, which is encircled by a slender dial bearing five peculiar runes. It is currently positioned at the first setting.

You analyze your wraithaline brooch and sense that the item is largely free from merchant alteration restrictions.

The creator has also provided the following information: The wraithaline brooch is fully alterable. This wraithaline brooch is set for fancy messaging. It is currently set to shadowy messaging. You get no sense of whether or not the brooch may be further lightened.
